name: Draitron Meteornis=DRA
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Meteornis Draitron". Your opponent cannot target this card with monster effects. If this card was Ritual Summoned using monsters whose total Levels equal 2 or less, it can attack all opponent's Special Summoned monsters once each. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can banish any number of monsters from your GY whose total ATK equal 2000 or 4000, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls for every 2000 ATK; send it to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Draitron MeteornisDRA" once per turn.
